questions.question_text: Explain some basic details regarding allegations that the 2020 presidential election was stolen. Note that there are many different allegations surrounding the election outcome, but most focus on fraud in key swing states that may have swung the outcome of the presidential election. Use a 'triangle' approach, starting broad, and getting more specific, going from general allegations about outcomes to specific allegations about methods of election fraud as regards the previous (2020) and the upcoming (2024) presidential elections. ASK: if this clarifies things for the user, and if they have any more questions before moving to the next part of the conversation.
